00077

00079     $stylenode->appendChild($linestylenode);
00080

00082     $linestylenode->appendChild($linecolornode);

00086 # Render a co-ordinate LineString
00087 function renderLineString($dom, $parentnode, $coorStr, $style) {
00088 
00089     // Creates a Placemark and append it to the Document.
00090     $node = $dom->createElement('Placemark');
00091     $placeNode = $parentnode->appendChild($node);
00092 
00093     $styleNode = $dom->createElement('styleUrl', "#" . $style);
00094     $placeNode->appendChild($styleNode);
00095 
00096     $pointNode = $dom->createElement('LineString');
00097     $placeNode->appendChild($pointNode);
00098 
00099     $coorNode = $dom->createElement('coordinates', $coorStr);
00100     $pointNode->appendChild($coorNode);
00101 
00102     $extrudeNode = $dom->createElement('extrude', '1');
00103     $pointNode->appendChild($extrudeNode);
00104 
00105     $tessellateNode = $dom->createElement('tessellate', '1');
00106     $pointNode->appendChild($tessellateNode);
00107 
00108     $altitudeModeNode = $dom->createElement('altitudeMode', 'relativeToGround');
00109     $pointNode->appendChild($altitudeModeNode);
00110 }
